original: KLOUMANN, Sigurd, Generaldirektör, Stockholm, f Vadsö, Norge, 1/7 79 av häradsh F J K o Karen Löwold, gm Fredrikke Nicolaysen. Ex Christiania tekn sk 99, stud.resor i Frankr, Engl, Tyskl, Schweiz, Ital o USA av vatten- krafts- o fabr.anläggn för elkem ind. Anst norska stat vägväs 99—00, vattenkraftsanläggn Glommen 00—02, tekn chef norska kväveind m vattenkraftsanläggn Svelgfoss, Rjukan, Vam-ma, Tysse, försöks- o fabr.anläggn, järnv o järnv.färjeförbind, De Norske Kvaelstofselsk, dir A/S Rjukanfoss, Norsk Transport A/S mfl. Grundat A/S Saudafallene m egna kraftvk f elkem storind, A/S Norsk Aluminium Co, A/S Nord Alum Industri, A/S Dansk Alum Co, AB Sv Alum.komp, Sv Aloxidvkn AB, styr.led där 0 i Arbeidsudvalget i Norg Industrifrb mfl. Ordf Friv Kraftverkers förening, Elkem Bedrifters förening, v. pres Norges Industrifrb, v. preses f Norge i Verdens Kraftkonferense. Ständ res Europa o USA i stud- o aff.syfte. Av trycket: Div broschyrer om världens framtida kraftförsörjn, om utförda större kraft-anläggn mfl. KVO, RNS :tOO, LIVA, LVA, Oslo Vidensk.akad, Kongl Norske Videnskaps-selskap. Hobby: Segling.
translated: KLOUMANN, Sigurd, Director General, Stockholm, b Vadsö, Norway, 1/7 79, son of district judge F J K and Karen Löwold, married to Fredrikke Nicolaysen. Attended Christiania Technical School in 99, studied abroad in France, England, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, and the USA, specializing in water, power, and factory installations for the electric chemical industry. Employed by the Norwegian state road authority from 99 to 00, involved in water power installations at Glommen from 00 to 02, technical manager of the Norwegian nitrogen industry with water power installations at Svelgfoss, Rjukan, Vamma, Tysse, experimental and factory installations, railway and railway ferry connections for De Norske Kvaestoffelsk, director of A/S Rjukanfoss, Norsk Transport A/S, and others. Founded A/S Saudafallene with his own power plant for the electric chemical industries, A/S Norsk Aluminium Co, A/S Nord Alum Industri, A/S Dansk Alum Co, AB Sv Alum.komp, Sv Aloxidvkn AB, served on the board of Arbeidsudvalget in Norg Industrifrb, and others. Chairman of the Volunteer Power Plants Association, Elkem Businesses Association, vice president of Norges Industrifrb, vice president of Norway at the World Power Conference. Regularly traveled to Europe and the USA for study and business purposes. Published various brochures on the future of power supply and completed major power installations, among others. Member of KVO, RNS, LIVA, LVA, Oslo Vidensk.akad, and Kongl Norske Videnskaps-selskap. Hobby: Sailing.

Technical manager of the Norwegian nitrogen industry
Director of A/S Norsk Aluminium Co
